_meta.description: Seed data for Narrative Messaging – UNC advancement. All metrics and stats marked as example/placeholder where applicable.

narratives.title: Major gift nudge – Carolina First
narratives.contentRef: Carolina First priorities and impact on student success and research.

modules.contentRef: Your connection to Carolina has always been about more than a degree—it's about the next generation of Tar Heels.

Carolina First is our most comprehensive campaign, supporting scholarships, faculty, and the programs that define the Carolina experience. A conversation can help align your giving with what matters most to you.
Schedule a conversation with your gift officer to explore options that fit your goals.
Thank you for your generous support of UNC.
Your gift helps Carolina students and faculty every day. We wanted you to know it's been received and is already at work.
See how your support makes a difference in the Carolina Impact portal.

narratives.title: Cultivation – research and scholarship impact
narratives.contentRef: How Carolina uses philanthropy for research and scholarships.

modules.contentRef: Carolina's research and scholarship programs are possible because of donors like you.
From endowed professorships to student scholarships, private support shapes what Carolina can achieve. Here's a snapshot of where that impact goes.
Learn more about priorities that might align with your interests.
It's been a while since we've heard from you—we'd love to reconnect.
Carolina continues to grow because of the community that supports it. If your priorities have shifted, we're here to help you find the right fit.
Update your preferences or tell us how you'd like to stay involved.

narratives.title: Stewardship touch – impact update
narratives.contentRef: Quarterly or annual impact update for current donors.

modules.contentRef: Here's how your support made a difference this year.
We've prepared a short update on the programs and people your generosity helps. Your commitment is what keeps Carolina moving forward.
View your personalized impact report in the portal.

narratives.title: Ask – leadership giving invitation
narratives.contentRef: Invitation to leadership giving (e.g., Bell Society).

modules.contentRef: You're among the donors we count on to lead.
Leadership giving through the Bell Society helps Carolina set the pace. We'd like to invite you to join this group and see the impact up close.
Learn more about the Bell Society and how to join.

proof_blocks.title: Carolina First campaign priority areas
proof_blocks.content: Carolina First focuses on three priorities: affordability and access, research and discovery, and the student experience. Gifts support scholarships, faculty positions, and campus programs. (Example placeholder scope.)

proof_blocks.title: Donor impact – gifts at work
proof_blocks.content: Your gift is already at work. This year, donor support helped fund [X] scholarships and [Y] research initiatives. (Internally reported; replace X/Y with current institutional figures.)

proof_blocks.title: Alumni giving participation (example)
proof_blocks.content: Alumni participation in giving helps Carolina maintain its strength. When more Tar Heels give at any level, it signals broad support and helps secure matching and challenge gifts. (Example placeholder—do not cite specific percentages without verification.)

proof_blocks.title: Research and faculty support
proof_blocks.content: Private support helps Carolina attract and retain world-class faculty and fund research that addresses global challenges. Endowed positions and research funds create lasting impact.

proof_blocks.title: Thank-you timing policy
proof_blocks.content: UNC sends an official receipt and thank-you within 48 hours of gift posting. Additional stewardship touches are tailored to giving level and designation.

proof_blocks.title: Scholarship recipient story (anecdotal)
proof_blocks.content: A current scholarship recipient shared: 'Donor support meant I could focus on my studies instead of worrying about costs. I'm grateful to every person who gives to Carolina.' (Anecdotal; use with permission.)

proof_blocks.title: Re-engagement benefit
proof_blocks.content: Re-engaging lapsed donors helps Carolina build a more resilient community of support. Your updated preferences help us tailor communications and opportunities to you.

proof_blocks.title: Impact report availability
proof_blocks.content: Your personalized impact report is available in the Carolina Impact portal. Reports are updated quarterly; you can view yours anytime after signing in.

proof_blocks.title: Bell Society recognition
proof_blocks.content: Bell Society members are recognized for their leadership giving and receive invitations to exclusive events, impact updates, and opportunities to connect with campus leadership.

proof_blocks.title: Leadership giving levels (example)
proof_blocks.content: Leadership giving levels are set annually and reflect the institution's priorities. Your gift officer can share current thresholds and benefits. (Placeholder—use current published levels.)

delivery_plays.title: High-propensity major gift nudge
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Propensity score above threshold (e.g. 0.7); portfolio priority = major gift
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: Max 1 email per 14 days; respect do-not-contact and opt-out

delivery_plays.title: Thank-you after gift posted
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Gift posted in CRM; event = gift_posted
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: Single touch per gift; no same-day duplicate

delivery_plays.title: Cultivation – time since last contact
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Days since last meaningful contact > 90; officer portfolio
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: Max 2 emails per month per constituent; do-not-contact respected

delivery_plays.title: Lapsed donor re-engagement
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Inactivity: no gift in 18 months; lapsed segment
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: Frequency cap 1 email + 1 SMS per 30 days; full DNC check

delivery_plays.title: Stewardship touch – anniversary
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Time-to-event: gift anniversary (e.g. 1 year since last gift)
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: One touch per anniversary; respect preferences

delivery_plays.title: Officer portfolio – leadership ask
delivery_plays.trigger_definition: Officer portfolio priority = leadership; capacity/affinity aligned
delivery_plays.suppression_rules: Per-officer cadence; no overlap with other leadership plays

preview_scenarios.context: High propensity score; no gift in 24 months; attended Carolina event last quarter
preview_scenarios.assembled_message:
Your connection to Carolina has always been about more than a degree—it's about the next generation of Tar Heels.

Carolina First is our most comprehensive campaign, supporting scholarships, faculty, and the programs that define the Carolina experience. A conversation can help align your giving with what matters most to you.

Carolina First focuses on three priorities: affordability and access, research and discovery, and the student experience. Gifts support scholarships, faculty positions, and campus programs. (Example placeholder scope.)

Alumni participation in giving helps Carolina maintain its strength. When more Tar Heels give at any level, it signals broad support and helps secure matching and challenge gifts. (Example placeholder—do not cite specific percentages without verification.)

Schedule a conversation with your gift officer to explore options that fit your goals.

preview_scenarios.context: Gift posted 24 hours ago; designation: Annual Fund
preview_scenarios.assembled_message: Thank you for your generous support of UNC. Your gift is already at work. Update your preferences or see your impact in the Carolina Impact portal.

preview_scenarios.context: Stewardship touch; 1-year gift anniversary; prefers portal
preview_scenarios.assembled_message:
Here's how your support made a difference this year.

We've prepared a short update on the programs and people your generosity helps. Your commitment is what keeps Carolina moving forward.

Your gift is already at work. This year, donor support helped fund [X] scholarships and [Y] research initiatives. (Internally reported; replace X/Y with current institutional figures.)

Your personalized impact report is available in the Carolina Impact portal. Reports are updated quarterly; you can view yours anytime after signing in.

View your personalized impact report in the portal.

preview_scenarios.context: Portfolio priority = leadership; capacity/affinity aligned; officer preparing for call
preview_scenarios.assembled_message:
OPENING: You're among the donors we count on to lead.

BODY: Leadership giving through the Bell Society helps Carolina set the pace. We'd like to invite you to join this group and see the impact up close.

PROOF: Bell Society members are recognized for their leadership giving and receive invitations to exclusive events, impact updates, and opportunities to connect with campus leadership. Leadership giving levels are set annually and reflect the institution's priorities. Your gift officer can share current thresholds and benefits. (Placeholder—use current published levels.)

CTA: Learn more about the Bell Society and how to join.

performance._note: Sample/demo data. Metrics are placeholders for display only.
